Identification.LongTitle: Proclamation Certifying Who Are the High Contracting Parties to the Warsaw Convention

Provision.Text: Now Know You that We, by and with the advice of Our Privy Council for Canada, do by this Our Proclamation certify

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: each state named in Part I of Schedule I and Schedule II hereto is a High Contracting Party to the Convention for the Unification of Certain Rules Relating to International Carriage by Air signed at Warsaw on October 12, 1929, in respect of the territory described in that Part opposite the state named;

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: each state named in Part II of Schedule I and Schedule II hereto is a High Contracting Party to the Protocol to amend the said Convention signed at The Hague on September 28, 1955 as set out in Schedule III to the Carriage by Air Act; and

Provision.Label: (c)
Provision.Text: each state that is a High Contracting Party named in Part III of Schedule I hereto has availed itself of the Additional Protocol to the said Convention to the extent that it has declared at the time of accession to the Convention that the first paragraph of Article 2 of the Convention shall not apply to international carriage by air performed directly by the state or any territory or possession under its jurisdiction.
The High Contracting Parties to the Convention and the Territories in respect of which they are respectively Parties (date on which the Convention came into force in respect of Party is shown).

entry.Emphasis: High Contracting Party to the Convention
Territory in respect of which it is a Party
Date Convention came into force in respect of Party

Provision.Text: Australia and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of Australia
France and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of the French Republic

row.entry: The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea
The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea

Provision.Text: The Netherlands and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of the Netherlands
New Zealand and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of New Zealand
Norway and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of Norway
South Africa and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of South Africa
Spain and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of Spain

row.entry: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics

Provision.Text: The U.S.S.R. and all territories comprised within the Soviet Socialist Republics

row.entry: The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

Provision.Text: The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of the United Kingdom
The United States of America and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of the United States of America
The High Contracting Parties to the Protocol signed at The Hague on September 28, 1955 (date on which the Protocol came into force in respect of Party is shown).

entry.Emphasis: High Contracting Party to the Protocol
Territory in respect of which it is a Party
Date Protocol came into force in respect of Party

row.entry: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics
The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics
The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

Provision.Text: The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and all territories subject to the sovereignty or authority of the United Kingdom
The High Contracting Parties that have availed themselves of the Additional Protocol (date on with the Additional Protocol came into force in respect of Party is shown).

entry.Emphasis: High Contracting Party to the Protocol
Territory in respect of which it is a Party
Date Additional Protocol came into force in respect of Party

Provision.Text: The High Contracting Parties to the Convention and the Territories in respect of which they are respective Parties (date on which the Convention came into force in respect of Party not ascertained).

entry.Emphasis: High Contracting Party of the Convention
Territory in respect of which it is a Party

Provision.Text: The High Contracting Parties to the Protocol signed at The Hague on September 28, 1955 (date on which the Protocol came into force in respect of Party not ascertained).

entry.Emphasis: High Contracting Parties to the Protocol
Territories in respect of which they are respectively Parties
